document_data.mainbody:
Klahu was a bookie who accepted bets at Executioners Run in Port Nyanzaru, Chult during the late 15 century DR.
If one of her bettors accrued a debt and refused to replay, Klahu would recruit adventurers to beat the debtor into submission and claim her money. She offered such hirelings 10% of the money which they recovered.
A gladiator named Taban came to owe a debt of 500 gp to Klahu. When he refused to pay, she sought adventurers to collect her money from him.
